phrs.translation: 强夺的, 贪婪的, 掠夺的, 捕食性的
贪婪的债权人, 贪婪债权人
狼吞虎咽的贪婪食肉的, 贪婪或贪吃的
豺狼成性, 虎狼成性

sentences.sentence: Unfortunately, the fans aren't all that rapacious.
sentences.translation: 不幸的是，粉丝们并非都那么狂热。

sentences.sentence: "You can get this burst of wealth that we have created from this rapacious behavior," added Romm.
sentences.translation: 罗姆说，“你无法得到这种从贪婪中创造出来的财富。”

sentences.sentence: But legislation to protect consumers from rapacious bankers has had unintended consequences, too.
sentences.translation: 但旨在保护消费者不受贪婪的银行家所害的法律，亦造成了意外的后果。
